frontMatter.title: RemcosRat infection chain from excel with Macros
frontMatter.summary: RemcosRAT is a Fileless multi-stage malware that is distributed through malicious macros in Excel files. The malware enables remote administration of infected systems to perform unintended actions.

prev.title: Return-Oriented Programming - Callme
prev.summary: Reliably make consecutive calls to imported functions. Use some new techniques and learn about the Procedure Linkage Table.

next.title: RedLineStealer Information Stealer Analysis
next.summary: Redline malware is an Information Stealer written in c# , targeting windows victims. It is used for gathering victims information ranging from the Browser cookies, saved credentials, Discord tokens...
